update.description: * Updated for Registration screen. * Updated to support torrent and FTP protocols.. * Updated to differentiate between resumable file formats and disable pause and save buttons accordingly with standalone+Queue download. * Updated to remove the log/event tracking functionality without user permission.. * Implemented the error tracker externally with various states and functionalities. * Added popup to ask to submit logs to tracking server.. * Updated access manager issue. * If an error occured while update, Please download the files directly from http://dtdm.in, and install.
